body.name: Bluetooth Mouse, Rechargeable Wireless Mouse Compatible with Macbook Air/Pro/Mac/iPad/Laptop/Tablet/Notebook/PC/Desktop, Slim Portable USB Mice for Windows/Linux/Android/(iOS 13.1.2 and Above), Black

features: Wide Compatibility: Bluetooth mouses are compatible with Windows, iPad/iPhone OS(13.1.2 and later version, not for OS 16.3.1), Mac OS(not for Mac OS 10.13.3 and Mojave system, please update your Macbook to the latest), Android and Linux. Tablet, Lenovo, Asus, HP, Surface, etc. If you use wireless mouse on iPad/iPhone/Mac, please upgrade your devices first. If you do not know how to connect, Please refer to the product description.

Bluetooth Connection: This bluetooth wireless mouse adapt bluetooth 4.0, easy to pair and connect quickly. No more other port or receiver needed, just open bluetooth on device and connect it, connection automatically every time when open your computer (It's recommended that disconnect or clear other Bluetooth devices before connecting our bluetooth mouse.).

Rechargeable Silent Mouse: The button click is barely audible, this quiet wireless mouse will reduce the noise up to 90%. Built in lithium-ion battery, one time fully 2～4 hours charge - work on 3～4 weeks. (The mouse enters sleep mode after five minutes, and then you have to reconnect every time? - No，Please do not use the power saving mode, You need to allow the device to be wake up.) The mouse's battery may be exhausted due to long-term transportation, please charge the mouse after received.

With 3 Adjustable DPI: DPI800/1200/1600, you are able to change the DPI according to your different demands. 1000 is office mouse territory. This bluetooth mouse using the high performance optical chips, which will work faster and more precision than the traditional mouse. You are able to get your work more efficient and save your time, ideal Mouse for office, home and leisure.

NOTE About Code: The mouse has been completely upgraded, and you do not need to enter the code. If a window prompts, click "OK" directly immediately within three seconds, the system has entered the code by default. If you enter the code yourself, the connection will fail. If the mouse still cannot connect, please Turn off WiFi and Bluetooth of your device and mouse a while, then turn on, connect and follow the instructions to connect.

productInformation.name: Customer Reviews
productInformation.value: 4.2 4.2 out of 5 stars 8,948 ratings 4.2 out of 5 stars

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: NOTE (Regarding the Solution to Mac Connection Errors) The mouse has been completely upgraded, and you do not need to enter the code. If a window prompts, click "OK" directly immediately within three seconds, the system has entered the code by default.If connect PIN needed, please enter "0000" and click "OK". If you enter the code yourself, the connection will fail.If the mouse still cannot connect, please turn off WiFi and Bluetooth of your device and mouse a while, then turn on, connect and follow the instructions to connect.Please apply a question, when you cannot solve it. Mac OS(not for Mac OS 10.13.3, OS 16.3.1 and Mojave system, please update your Macbook to the latest)
NOTICE !!! -- Please remove your other Bluetooth devices before connecting the mouse -- Please do not use the power saving mode. You need to allow the device to be wake up.

Q and A Q1: Why can't the mouse connect to your iPhone/iPad? !!! A : Very sorry! Please check if your version is updated to iOS 13.1.2 OR later version. For IOS system, our mouse is only compatible with iOS 13.1.2 or later version. Q2: Why Bluetooth is connected and then disconnected after few minutes? A: 1. Low battery (please charge) 2. Computer hibernation (please set the power mode to 'balance' mode) Q3: Why is the cursor inaccurate? A: 1. Low battery (please charge) 2. Please Use mouse pad Q4: When connected to mac, if appears: no mouse found, what should you do? A: return operation-- press the "connect" of mouse again--blue light flash--click the mouse logo in the mac--you will find "Bluetooth mouse 4.0" again--click continue immediately Q5: If found the 'Bluetooth mouse 4.0', but can't connect, what should you do? A: Please delete 'bluetooth mouse 4.0'--turn off the mouse--turn on the mouse and click button--blue light flash-- Reconnect 'bluetooth mouse 4.0' Q6: The first time the mouse is connected to the 'tablet' and work well.I want to use it on my 'laptop', but the mouse doesn't work anymore.(Why) A: If you want to connect to the laptop, please delete the mouse‘s Bluetooth "Bluetooth mouse 4.0" in the tablet, and then reconnect. If you still have doubts or problems, please refer to our manual Or watch our video, thank you very much!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A Great Mouse with a lot of Cheese
reviews.reviewText: This is truly a great little mouse. It has all the trimmings of the Apple but at 1/3 the cost. It comes with a usbc cable for charging and charges in no time. It hold a charge for weeks with no problem. I needed a mouse to operate a complex Editing software Final Cut Pro. And it works flawlessly. It is responsive and operates on any surface. It is comfortable and easy on your hand under long hours of use. The build quality is great and it hooks up immediately on Bluetooth with no problem. I use it both on my Mac Mini M1 and on my IPad 12.9 M2. In summary it’s a great unit, technically perfect and reliable. The price points are great a unit that will last for a long time. For the money you get a lot of Cheese.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Literally never dies
reviews.reviewText: I bought this for my ipad, but have since upgraded to a laptop and it works great for both. Its light and thin, very low profile. I think i've charged it once since I bought it last semester. I forget to turn it off and it just stays alive. I haven't had any problems with lag or responsiveness based on surface texture. Glass tables, bed sheets, carpets, countertops, desk tops, you name it, this mouse will track across it. To the point where I don't even own a mousepad. Haven't needed one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great Mouse for the Price
reviews.reviewText: I needed a backup mouse for my macbook. I actually ordered a more expensive mouse but the pairing process was difficult. I wanted a simple mouse that was easy to pair and moved smoothly. This mouse did exactly that. Highly recommend for the price. Only wish it had a bit more heft as it feels like it won't last for eternity :) But will report back if it does, which would deserve the 5th star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The mouse is great! It is super easy and holds charge for a while! It charges quickly and fits well in my hand. Everything works really well and it’s a great apple dupe. It fits in my plan really well and doesn’t make my hand cramp when I use it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Excellent Battery life, smooth compatibility with my Macbook Pro 2023
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased this wireless mouse from Amazon and am thoroughly impressed with its performance. The connectivity to my macbook pro 2023 is exceptional. What truly sets it apart is its remarkable battery life; it lasts significantly longer on a single charge compared to other devices I've used. The device is well-built, offering a sturdy design that exudes durability. Additionally, the intuitive controls and extra features enhance the overall user experience, making it a versatile and reliable choice. In short, this wireless mouse has exceeded my expectations with its outstanding connectivity, extended battery life, and overall quality, making it a highly recommended purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Works OK, but there are cons
reviews.reviewText: I bought this mouse primarily because it offers a wireless bluetooth connection and is large enough to let my hand rest on it comfortably (most bluetooth mice seem to be the small 'mobile' variety). In terms of its basic functioning it works well: it makes the bluetooth connection with my Windows 11 computer without any problems, it guides the mouse pointer around as expected, and has left and right click buttons that work just fine. However, there are some significant 'cons' which I list below. If none of them are important to you, this mouse may be what you want.Here are the cons in order of importance:1. Most (all?) bluetooth mice will go to sleep after a certain period of inactivity in order to save on the battery. The Logitech mice I've had will wake up when motion is detected. I consider that to be proper behavior. Unfortunately, this mouse only wakes up when you click one of the buttons. It wouldn't be so bad if it swallowed the click but, instead, it passes the click through to the computer. If the pointer on the screen happens to be hovering over a button or link then it can be a problem. A number of times I've been surprised by something unexpected happening on my computer because of this. It could potentially cause a delete or take you somewhere you don't want to go.2. The mouse is very flat compared to other mice. This may be attractive from an aesthetic point of view, but if you look at other mice you'll see that they generally have a pronounced 'hump'. If you let your hand rest by your side, you'll notice it curves inward; laying it flat on a table is slightly uncomfortable. Since many people often spend considerable time with their hand resting on their mouse, the 'hump' provides better support.3. The mouse has a built-in battery and is rechargeable. That's great. However, the connector on the mouse is non-standard (everything should be Type-C by now). If you lose the cable that comes with it, you may have difficulty finding a replacement.4. The instructions that come with it are not the worst I've seen (by a fair margin), but they're not complete. There is an extra button on the top of the mouse and the instructions say nothing about it. When I looked back on the web page I was able to figure out that the extra button controls the mouse's resolution. Changing it did nothing as far as I could tell. Also, the web page says to charge the mouse as soon as you get it, while the instructions say to use the mouse until the battery runs down, then give it the first charge.Recommendation: Stick with Logitech, Microsoft, other another established company. These hole-in-the-wall companies selling generic products are too much trouble.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best out of 3 mouse I have tried.
reviews.reviewText: It took me a while to find the right mouse for what I need. I kept looking at a few and none of them would connect properly via Bluetooth. Sure I had to keep adjusting it, disconnecting and re-connecting. Pairing and re-pairing. But no such luck in any that remained functional until I found this mouse. It's a good mouse, there's good accuracy and it's stylish. The best part about it is that it automatically connects without me having to keep re-attaching it like the 3 other mouse I have tried. Thank gosh! I am extremely happy with the price too. I really have no complaints at all other than I wish I bought this before the others. Very Satisfied!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 9, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good value for price
reviews.reviewText: Good value for the price. Works well as a basic mouse. Unfortunately I work in FCPX (video editing) and the main feature this lacks compared to a real Magic Mouse is the ability so side-scroll horizontally by sliding your finger on the mouse as you can with a Magic Mouse. This mouse you have to find a scroll bar on the bottom of your application or webpage if you need to move horizontally. I imagine for 99% of people who don’t do video editing, not having this feature won’t be issue, so it’s a great for the price, but for video editing i find it quite frustrating not to have so I’ll probably still pony up and buy another Magic Mouse.
Wonderful pointer device. It can do everything I expected it to, except make harmonica sounds.
Compact size and delivers the functions as written.

reviews.reviewTitle: Great quality for price but asks for PIN when pairing UPDATED:
reviews.reviewText: I’ve been using the mouse for about 7 months and it has been great so far. Just today however it is asking for a PIN to reconnect via Bluetooth. Not sure why but besides that its a ok mouse.- UPDATE -: The seller sent me a new one completely for free. I even managed to find a workaround to the PIN question for Windows 11 but they insisted that I get a new one to avoid reconnecting every now and then. Here is the workaround:-Go on the device in Bluetooth and press "Forget" or "Delete".-Press on the arrow on your taskbar. Select Bluetooth.-Press "Join a Personal Area Network", then add a new device at the top of the screen.-Make sure you press the "connect" button under the mouse.-Once you click and it asks for a PIN, just press "Next" and it should work just fine.The instructions of the seller were not too clear so I thought I would drop this here. I did all these steps with the charging cable connected just in case. Overall its the best mouse you'll find for this price and its very durable and good. I recommend! Let me know if these steps helped you, I would be glad to help out if they didn't.

reviews.reviewTitle: It does not work and you have to pay to ship it back to USA at a cost of US$20
reviews.reviewText: This product was listed as compatible with MAC computers. But it is NOT. Now they want me to send it back to the vendor in the USA at a cost of US20, which is half of what I paid for the product. So I have to throw good money after bad since I cannot trust them to provide a refund after their deception
